description: Zman2Go is a Jewish calendar and zmanim utility providing the user a quick & easy way to find the proper davening times for most of the world.  Zman2Go includes a built-in Jewish calendar with Torah portion for the week, Holidays, fast information and candle lighting times.  Version 0.6.5 corrects the calculation of Chanukah when there is only one day of Rosh Chodesh and it adds the ability to swipe left/right in both the month and day views for previous and next.
versionNote: Version 0.6.5 corrects the calculation of Chanukah when there is only one day of Rosh Chodesh and it adds the ability to swipe left/right in both the month and day views for previous and next.
